title: Broken
description: He’s too broken to care; she doesn’t care that she’s broken...Fighting what feels like an impossible battle, Jesse hits rock bottom. Rain-soaked, and with a bottle as his only companion, he sees a light – and a woman as broken as himself. Something about her pulls him out of the darkness and sets his feet on a path to a future he never thought he’d have.Kari is also caught in a downward spiral, but she has no clue that the annoying drunk sleeping in front of her car may be the key to her deepest desires. Together, these two will struggle to overcome heartbreak and pain, learning to trust and laugh together as they discover the pleasures of passion.Will it work? Neither knows. They will have to find out for themselves that even if something’s broken, it can be fixed. All it takes is love.
author: S.L. Carpenter
